name: Videographer to the Stars
description:
Review calculus and trigonometry the best way possible--off-balance, under-informed, and after an early-morning drive! Adapts the classic camera-rocket problem (as seen in Stewart's Calculus!) into a visual-novel format, illustrated with photos, document mock-ups, and hastily-assembled animation.

You might just learn a little Python along the way!

3 endings, 2500 words.

Originally released in 2014, the v1.1 release includes new imagery, dialogue edits, readability improvements--and, of course, bug-fixes.
